allow:
Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\tyler\\openclaw1" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(local-places\): replace developer hostname with localhost in default server URL

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(revenue-engine\): merge v4.2 Bell Curve and Error Forecasting from pacific-revenue-engine

Port the full decision tree from the legacy Google Apps Script repo into
the OpenClaw TypeScript engine.  Adds monthly Error Forecasting \(3-multiplier
diagnosis with smoothed correction caps\), weekly Bell Curve tactical scan
\(Back Half rate increases, Front Half price drops / sliding-scale promotions\),
market state detection \(HOT/COLD/NEUTRAL â†’ operating modes\), APS decay,
Extended Stay Incentive, Last Minute Deal, and corrected Key Data API POST
endpoints \(/api/v1/ota/market/kpis/week and /month\).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(revenue-engine\): connect to live Key Data API

Switch base URL from api.keydatadashboard.com to api-beta.keydatadashboard.com
per official Postman docs, use real UUID market identifiers instead of slugs,
aggregate per-OTA rows \(airbnb/vrbo\) into per-date averages, widen historical
lookback to 6 months, and extract avg_stay_length from live KPI data.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(revenue-engine\): add Hospitable API client for live property data

Port HospitableClient.gs to TypeScript and wire it into fetchPropertyStatsSafe\(\)
so the engine pulls live RevPAR, occupancy, ADR, and pricing from Hospitable''s
calendar and reservations endpoints. Falls back to demo data when no API key is set.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(hospitable\): match actual API v2 response structure and load dotenv

Update calendar parsing for nested data.days[] with status.reason and
price.amount \(cents\). Add required properties[] filter to reservations
endpoint. Load dotenv in main.ts so .env credentials are available at runtime.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
